title: Software Developer

role: Hired to do a full rewrite of Ignite's beta version desktop app from a mangling of JavaScript, JQuery, React, HTML and CSS to a typed, developer friendly, adaptable, extensible and reusable code base.

title: Freelance Software Developer

title: Bicycle Assembly Mechanic
